title: What are some uncommon male spy names? I need a unique one for a book I am writing. The best name will be entered in the book. Any ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are some uncommon male spy names? I need a unique one for a book I am writing. The best name will be entered in the book. Any ideas? The best spies would have such innocuous names that nobody would even notice them. If you’re looking for something mysterious (that will be like having “I SPY” tattooed across their forehead), try names with X or Z in them. Sandor or even Zandor sound like somebody sinister out of Transylvania, and Xavier has that nice zzz sound at the beginning. Of course, Xavier was also a saint but we can’t expect exclusivity of names.
